metadata.title: The psychiatric impact of the novel coronavirus outbreak
metadata.abstract: Patients with confirmed or suspected 2019-nCoV (new coronavirus disease) may experience fear of the consequences of being infected with a potentially fatal new virus, and those in quarantine might experience boredom, loneliness, and anger.
